item.title: Katie add a quote by Martin Luther
item.description: "So when the devil throws your sins in your face and declares that you deserve death and hell, tell him this: "I admit that I deserve death and hell, what of it? For I know One who suffered and made satisfaction on my behalf. His name is Jesus Christ, Son of God, and where He is there I shall be also!" -- Martin Luther

item.title: Katie add a quote by Martin Luther
item.description: "I have so much to do that I shall spend the first three hours in prayer." -- Martin Luther

item.title: Katie add a quote by Martin Luther
item.description: "Let the wife make her husband glad to come home and let him make her sorry to see him leave." -- Martin Luther

item.title: Katie add a quote by Martin Luther
item.description: "God writes the gospel not in the Bible alone, but on trees and flowers and clouds and stars." -- Martin Luther

item.title: Katie add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "There comes a time when one must take a position that is neither safe, nor politic, nor popular, but he must take it because his conscience tells him it is right...." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Katie add a quote by Martin Luther
item.description: "I have held many things in my hands, and I have lost them all; but whatever I have placed in God's hands, that I still possess." -- Martin Luther

item.title: Katie add a quote by Martin Luther
item.description: "There is no more lovely, friendly and charming relationship, communion, or company than a good marriage." -- Martin Luther

item.title: Katie add a quote by Martin Luther
item.description: "I know not the way God leads me, but well do I know my Guide." -- Martin Luther

item.title: Katie add a quote by Martin Luther
item.description: "The heart overflows with gladness, and leaps and dances for the joy it has found in God. In this experience the Holy Spirit is active, and has taught us in the flash of a moment the deep secret of joy. You will have as much joy and laughter in life as you have faith in God." -- Martin Luther

item.title: Katie add a quote by Martin Luther
item.description: "Peace if possible. Truth at all costs." -- Martin Luther

item.title: Katie add a quote by Martin Luther
item.description: "Whoever drinks beer, he is quick to sleep; whoever sleeps long, does not sin; whoever does not sin, enters Heaven! Thus, let us drink beer!" -- Martin Luther

item.title: Katie add a quote by Martin Luther
item.description: "This grace of God is a very great, strong, mighty and active thing. It does not lie asleep in the soul. Grace hears, leads, drives, draws, changes, works all in man, and lets itself be distinctly felt and experienced. It is hidden, but its works are evident." -- Martin Luther

item.title: Katie add a quote by Martin Luther
item.description: "One learns more of Christ in being married and rearing children than in several lifetimes spent in study in a monastery." -- Martin Luther
